name: Konstant Infosolutions
tagline: App Development Company for Startups & Enterprises
description:
Konstant Info is one of the highest rated Web and Mobile App Development Company across India & USA. With more than 2500+ happy customers worldwide, and having delivered 3500+ successful apps, we are constantly driving our efforts towards building long-lasting relations over past 16 years. We have served 30+ industries, both large Enterprises as well as by start-ups for building swift and agile apps that are highly performant and efficient in cost.
We Have Developed Apps That Win Users Attention
➢ We developed web and app for Malaysia-based meta-search hotel portal that won WIT Indonesia’s start-up pitch
➢ Our development work for android launcher tablet app impressed Pope Francis - 266th Pope and sovereign of the Vatican City State.
➢ One of our developed website is winner of Bravo Zulu Awards 2017.
➢ Our web work wins Ventures Clash Awards with a Big Cash Prize.
Our Key Differentiators:
➢ Offer truly unique iOS and Android app solutions to the smallest of startups and largest enterprises
➢ Our tailored methodology as well as deliverables based on client’s specific business needs and objectives
➢ Highest-level of professionalism and client service, navigating the time zone, language and cultural variables
➢ Cutting-edge technologies like IoT, wearable, Cloud, Artificial Intelligence (AI), VR/AR, etc.
READ MORE...

locations.address: A-23, Swej Farm, Relience Fresh Lane
